title: Tonal
description: Smart home gym with digital weight system and AI-powered coaching.
longDescription: Lead Android Engineer for all software on the Tonal device. Built the main fitness app, AOSP customizations, and integrations with embedded firmware, smart accessories, and Bluetooth peripherals. Tonal holds ~90% market share in connected strength training.

title: Life360
description: Family safety and location sharing app with 80M+ monthly active users.
longDescription: Staff Engineer on growth, international, and product teams. Founded Mobile Academy, led Android team's transition from Java to Kotlin and Rx to Coroutines, and helped spin up 100+ engineers across EMEA. Panelist at LaunchDarkly Galaxy 2022.

title: Keepsafe Vault
description: Private photo vault app with 75M+ downloads and 70M+ users.
longDescription: Senior Software Engineer for Android applications. Developed features for the Keep Safe Vault, an award-winning photo locker trusted by millions to protect their private photos and videos.

title: Grindr
description: Social networking app with 14M+ monthly active users.
longDescription: iOS development for one of the world's largest social networking apps, serving millions of users globally.

title: Disney Movie Anywhere
description: Digital movie platform with 6M+ users and 150M+ movies stored.
longDescription: Senior Architect at Novoa Media for Disney's digital movie platform. The service allowed users to access Disney, Pixar, Marvel, and Star Wars content across devices. Later evolved into Movies Anywhere.

title: P90X
description: Iconic fitness program app, part of Beachbody platform serving 30M+ customers.
longDescription: Development work on the mobile app for Tony Horton's legendary P90X fitness program, bringing the intense 90-day workout regimen to mobile devices.

title: Nook Video
description: Barnes & Noble video streaming app for the NOOK ecosystem.
longDescription: Android development for Barnes & Noble's video streaming service, part of the NOOK digital content platform with access to millions of titles.

title: Razer Cortex
description: Gaming utility app for game boosting, launcher, and rewards.
longDescription: Android development for Razer's gaming companion app featuring game boosting, a unified game launcher, streaming/recording capabilities, and the Razer Silver rewards program.

title: Razer Nabu
description: Companion app for Razer Nabu fitness band.
longDescription: Android and iOS development for the companion app to Razer's Nabu fitness band, enabling fitness tracking, notifications, and social features.

title: RazerGo
description: Location-based Pokemon GO chat app built in one week.
longDescription: Engineering Lead for a location-based chat messenger for Pokemon GO players. Built Android, iOS, and web versions in just one week. Featured scalable radius chat from 5km to 1,000km with team-based chat modes.

title: Nytch
longDescription: iOS development work on the Nytch application.

title: Disney Medusa
longDescription: iOS development for Disney's internal Medusa project at Novoa Media.

title: Razer Leviathan Mini
longDescription: Engineering Lead for the companion app for Razer's Leviathan Mini portable Bluetooth speaker, enabling audio customization and device control.

title: Razer Nabu Watch
longDescription: Engineering Lead for the companion app for Razer's Nabu Watch smartwatch, providing notification management, fitness tracking, and device customization.

title: Razer Nabu Fitness Band
longDescription: Engineering Lead for the companion app for Razer's Nabu Fitness Band, enabling activity tracking, sleep monitoring, and social fitness features.
